Regarding the last row on the table: we include slightly more unconventional media in our catalogue such as movie soundtracks, sound collages, audio exercise programs, home movies, even corporate-level training discs created by private companies. Most of this audio is believed to be found in physical format only and relatively unheard, guaranteeing a significant level of obscurity.
**an important note when ordering miscellaneous items.
